about.my-description: , I'm a gamer since I was old enough to hold a controller and a passionate video game developer, I am known for my great ability to adapt and learn. I currently work at Gameloft Montreal as a Back End Developer. I dream of getting a position in gameplay or general programming.

gameloft.name: Gameloft
gameloft.header: Back End Developer | Montreal (QC) | May 2022 - Present
gameloft.task1: Develop microservices made in Python used by most of the company's games for authentication, players progression, matchmaking, and others in an Agile Scrum environment.
gameloft.task2: Optimize and ensure high availability of the microservices using AWS, Docker and Kubernetes as they need to handle more than 10 billion queries per day.
gameloft.task3: Actively participate in operational incident responses, helping to troubleshoot and resolve any issues in a timely manner.

genetec.name: Genetec
genetec.task1: Write with C# and .NET a plugin allowing to use smart padlocks in a building surveillance software and to manage access controls in an Agile Kanban environment.
genetec.task2: Wrote unit tests with NUnit and SpecFlow frameworks.

nba.name: NB Automation
nba.header: Full Stack Developer (internship) | Granby (QC) | May 2019 - August 2019
nba.task1: Added and updated forms in a CRUD software using C#, .NET and WPF used to perform quality control on manufactured products.
nba.task2: Improved the design of an SQL database.

projects.stepping-stones-description: It's december 31 1999 when the year 2000's bug hits systems all over the world and history is erased. You must run through the ages, bring back our history and rediscover inventions of humanity. Made with Unreal Engine 5, C++, Blueprints and Wwise.
projects.sauve-chouris-description: Save Chouris, your friend who is stuck in Madame Fauch√©'s mansion! You will have to locate yourself with your echolocation power. Made with Unity, C# and Wwise.
projects.elemensions-description: In ElemEnsions, you play as Guerna the adventurous goblin in search of a new treasure. In order to overcome the many obstacles of the ruins, you have at your disposal the power of the Portalite pendant, an artifact found during a past adventure, which allows you to change from one elemental dimension to another. Each element has its unique properties: Fire, Air, Water, Earth. Made with Unity and C#.
projects.back-to-the-party-description: Back to the Party is a 2 player cooperative experience. A player is in the past and must manage a party at his apartment. He must satisfy the needs of his guests in order to become their friend. Satisfying these needs provides the answers for an exam happening in the future. The other player is in the future and must answer the exam questions with the answers obtained. He must also provide resources to the past player via a quantum portal. Made with Unity, C#, Blender and Fmod.
projects.purrfect-escape-description: In Purrfect Escape, we take on the role of a cat who is eager to go outside in order to satisfy his hunting instincts. However, this one is a prisoner of his house and his humans will not let him out. Can he find a way to escape? Made with Unity and C#.
projects.worfo-description: World of Rune Fantasy Online is an open world MMORPG game. Go on an adventure alone or with friends. Quest, fight, explore, improve your skills. Play your way and shape your destiny! Made with Unity, C#, MySQL and Ink.
